website_summaries.verdict: Condensed study guide that focuses on the challenging mathematical aspects of the real estate exam.
pros: No fluff in this study guide
you'll only receive info on key concepts that are actually important
Can work through the book and practice questions quickly
Especially good for those who need a math refresher
cons: Is an "overview" type of guide rather than a comprehensive one

customer_reviews.title: Do not order!
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. Expect a math book and I got a kids Christmas coloring book. Does not deserve even one star but it made me put one
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Of limited use
customer_reviews.text: I took the exam three days ago. Only a few questions were on math issues and most of what this book teaches were not on the test. Glad I did the refresher but it was of very limited use in passing the Florida real estate exam.
customer_reviews.author: JHDScot

customer_reviews.title: I'm an evangelist for this book!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and co-author of the textbooks used by Michigan people to prepare for the state real estate exams. I preach this book ! I believe that we've run it out of print more than once. I recommend it to every student who needs some practice with real estate math. The publisher should be paying me a commission by now :)
customer_reviews.author: foraminut

customer_reviews.title: Why sweat the math?
customer_reviews.text: This book is very thorough. I felt I had command of the math related real estate after I finished the book. The instruction in my Pre-Licensing math classes was grossly inadequate. So I had very little confidence in my knowledge base. That said, it was a bit of overkill taking hours of time in less than 20 percent of the exam content. Learn all the definitions and the code and pass the test. Don't sweat the math.
customer_reviews.author: Gapa

customer_reviews.title: Real Estate Math Express
customer_reviews.text: A MUST HAVE for all Real Estate Agents who struggle with math. This book is very detailed and informative. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: A must have book for the real estate exam.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book. There are enough problems to teach you the concepts. I would couple the explanations with more detail. This is a must buy for anyone having questions and needing further math practice for the real estate exam.
customer_reviews.author: R MAX BAEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband because he is in Real Estate School here in North Carolina. He really likes this book and says it is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as listed ... now I just have to learn all of the material in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Revis

customer_reviews.title: Love the handwritten note!
customer_reviews.text: After opening my package I noticed there was a handwritten note, thanking me for my purchase. I am beyond happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic review for math questions on any exam
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic review for math questions on any exam. Straight to the point with easy to follow solutions with no confusing extra steps thrown in to "help". This text is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Larabee

customer_reviews.title: Little difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if there were examples for each problem. Also if there was an easy one and a hard one. The book is a little vit difficult to understand
customer_reviews.author: patricia lee

customer_reviews.title: It was a coloring book????
customer_reviews.text: Ordered twice and it came with the correct cover but inside was a Christmas coloring book. Not sure it will help me pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for someone as a gift and they love it
customer_reviews.author: Ms Cee

customer_reviews.title: Love this Book
customer_reviews.text: This book is a great way of recalling math back to mind. Glad I purchased it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rece

customer_reviews.title: Good as reference not 100% up to date
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok a bit outdated due to upgraded real estate express program. Good reference though
customer_reviews.author: Alicia C Acho

customer_reviews.title: Too big for it's own good!
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I bought the handbook instead of an e-book (Kindle). The book contains everything you need for the testing. I am considering buying the hard copy for future references. The ebook version, just doesn't have the room to cram all that information onto a small screen!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer62

customer_reviews.title: This is a good book for test prep
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book for test prep. It has challenging questions that help prepare for the state exam.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: good resource however there are numerical TYPOS. Not good for a math book
customer_reviews.author: Logan T.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This book is recommended by the #1 ranked Real estate school in central Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Greta for the mayth review. Who knwew so much math was involved in real estate sales!
customer_reviews.author: Dave W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Pre Coursing.. Thinking about taking it.. Some Hard Math lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Required guide to help pass exam
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and is just what I needed for studying.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: I would give this a MUST HAVE for anyone getting ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a MUST HAVE for anyone getting their license. I learned so much from this book in regards to math, much more then I learned in my classes.
customer_reviews.author: Isabeau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Book arrived quickly, helped me brush up on my math skills for real estate exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing, and great for new real estate, loan servicing professions, basic math which makes it less complicated for new beginning entering the world have real estate
customer_reviews.author: T. Holiday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Here's what will really help with math, not the previous review...error!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dunlap-Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Haven't started my real estate class yet, but math has always been my weakness. Purchasing this book will definitely help me learn what I need to pass the state exam. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jonnetta Binion

customer_reviews.title: There are books that teach you to understand the math, rather than memorize the numbers.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like how the numbers aren’t explained. They’re just listed to be memorized, rather than explained. I guess that’s why it’s called Real Estate Math Express. It could’ve been concise, and still explain the numbers, as there is a lot of white space.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, Ut really helped me alot
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, Ut really helped me alot , Its Been awhile since ive been in math and Real Estate Math Is No Joke!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware dummies like myself
customer_reviews.text: What a total joke/ripoff! Well maybe I'm being too harsh. After all, you only need to learn about 35 formulas and then just "cram for the test!" Problem for most people like me is that we don't how to USE these formulas...I mean that was what I thought I was going to learn with this book.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Book is very basic, lists "formulas" which are very ...
customer_reviews.text: Book is very basic, lists "formulas" which are very basic and, in some cases, less than completely explained. Bulk of the book is practice questions with answers and explanations given separately. There is very little explanation of the formulas and, for example, the calculation of front and back end ratios (not called that in the book!) doesn't factor in PITI--a term also not used or covered. Book is okay for the very basics, but not particularly instructive.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: What a crock!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I rated this book with one star is because I had to. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY BUYING THIS BOOK!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy
